Translations.Text: ultimatum hic proles DEUS His messenger idol worshipers iniit into treaty vos
Ergo roam terra freely 4 mensis know vos non escape DEUS ac ut DEUS humiliates disbelievers

proclamation hic proles DEUS His messenger totus people major feria pilgrimage ut DEUS disowned idol worshipers ac ita perfecit His messenger! Sic vos repent it est bene vos. Vos turn tunc know vos nunquam escape DEUS. Promise those disbelieve painful retribution
idol worshipers signum pax treaty vos non violate it nor manus unus others vos vos fulfill tuus treaty them expiration datum. DEUS loves the righteous

(Dodum Sanctus Mensis est they refuse factus pax) vos kill idol worshipers when vos encounter them punish them resist omnis move they factus! they repent observe Contact Prayers (Salat) dedit obligatory charity (Zakat) vos let them! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
de idol worshipers sought safe passage vos vos grant eum safe passage ita ut he hear word DEUS tunc send eum his locus security. Ut est they est people qui non know
